Petur O. JOHNSON, Appellant, v. FRANK SHERIDAN JONAS & SON and Frank Sheridan Jonas, Inc., a New York Corporation, as Successor In Interest to Frank Sheridan Jonas & Son, Appellees. No. 225, Docket 20534. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. April 28, 1947. Joseph Leary Delaney, Edward S. Mena-pace, and Wagner, Quillinan, Wagner & Tennant, all of New York City, for appel-lees.

Before AUGUSTUS N. HAND, CHASE, and FRANK, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Affirmed on opinion of Leibell, J., 71 F. Supp. 668.
